effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
